sub_fields.label: Background Color

sub_fields.name: id_of_section

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: gallery
sub_fields.instructions: To add a Caption, click on the image after you select for the gallery and you can edit additional fields.

sub_fields.label: Id of section to scroll to
sub_fields.name: id_of_section

sub_fields.label: Content Alignment
sub_fields.name: content_align
sub_fields.instructions: What side of the page do you want the content on?

sub_fields.label: Which tile to scroll To
sub_fields.name: which_tile_to_scroll_to
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the number of content block you wish to scroll to.

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: hero_image
fields.instructions: This will add an image into the hero area above the content
